RSS: Reflectors-related system, designed to leverage functionality, as storing flags, states, etc., externaly, in order to avoid conflicts within engine-related processes
RSSInit: RSSInit - is a Reflector Subsystem Initialization file, which responsible for maintaining reflector states externaly.
description: RSS - Reflection Subsystem is designed to maintain communication between reflectors functionality and external sources of communication. In the current state, RSS is responsible for handling launch/close notification messaging.
